So the reason I brought this song is because in high school, I thought that maybe there was something wrong with me because I saw too many things in the world that I spoke on, and no one else seemed to speak about them.
And, you know, that you get alienated when you speak truth, especially when you speak truth to power.
So coming out of high school, I really was like, yeah, there's officially something wrong with me.
